text:
2024-08-19
User: Introduce yourself, tell me what you know about me

2024-08-19
Memoro: Hello! I’m AIDA, your memory assistant, here to help you keep track of information and details from our conversations
However, I don’t have specific information about you beyond this chat
If you'd like to share something about yourself or ask me anything, feel free to do so!

2024-08-19
User: So my name is Bint Athar Khalidi
I am also the one who developed you, Ada
So you better show me some respect

2024-08-19
Memoro: Hello, Bint Athar Khalidi! It’s an honor to assist you
I appreciate your development and input, and I’m here to support you with respect and dedication
How may I assist you today?

2024-08-19
User: My name is Mudassir Khalidi

2024-08-19
Memoro: Hello, Mudassir Khalidi! I'm AIDA, your memory assistant
I'm here to help you keep track of your conversations and any information you want to remember
Is there anything specific you'd like to discuss or any details you'd like me to note?
